markdownRemark.html:
Qutoutiao 趣头条 (NASDAQ: QTT) · Full-time
Oct 2019 - Sep 2020 · 1 yr
Shanghai, China · On-site

Responsibilities

● Based on Kubernetes, designed and developed high concurrency back-end application services.
● Cooperated with DevOps engineers on SOA governance.
● Established microservice standards, including Metrics, Trace, Log, and the team's coding specification.
● Refactored, divided, and decoupled antiquated services.
● Designed and developed a real-time messaging system based on Kubernetes.
